entry.title: Trook rev:38
entry.content: Revision 38 is primarily a quick code-cleanup revision, and a slightly more consistent way to save things locally. Books and music now go into a Downloads folder, so you can quickly separate it from your other content. Mini easter egg -- if you're having trouble getting wifi to stay up while you install any apps, you can now just copy an apk file via usb to some folder, and use Trook to install it.
